thread.title: Courtney

author: Courtney
title: Courtney
text: I have been a customer for a few years now I don't leave the country without using BlueSun Vacations formerly known as Apple Vacations... Mary is simply amazing she always goes the extra mile for my girls trip. We haven't been disappointed yet, we all live in different states but once a year we get together and enjoy ourselves. We have been to Jamaica, Mexico, Dominican Republic and this year we are going to the Bahamas.. I'm so excited!!!
